page.title: 11SOCIAL EVENTS, BLEASDALE
page.content:
For many years Field Day has been held on the Parish Hall field in May.In the afternoon sports are held for junior age children.Tea is served in the Parish Hall.This is followed by fancy dress and miniature garden competitions.The senior children's sports are held in the early evening.A social is then held for all the family.
The day after the Harvest Festival services the offerings are brought down to the Parish Hall and after baskets have been made up for the sick,an auction of fruit,vegetables and other goods is held.
At Christmas presents are distributed to every child by Father Christmas at a Parish Christmas Tree,this is followed by games and dancing.
